verses.text: \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w pleased|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H7125"\w* \w omens|strong="H5173"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* previous occasions, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w turned|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* encamped \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* God \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* \w oracle|strong="H5002"\w*, saying: “\w This|strong="H5375"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w whose|strong="H1397"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w open|strong="H8365"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5002"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w one|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H7706"\w* \w hears|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* words \w of|strong="H5869"\w* God, \w who|strong="H7706"\w* \w sees|strong="H2372"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w who|strong="H7706"\w* bows \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w with|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* wide \w open|strong="H1540"\w*:

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* lovely \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3478"\w* \w tents|strong="H4908"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w your|strong="H3478"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*!

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w spread|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* palm groves, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w* \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stream|strong="H5158"\w*, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* aloes \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w planted|strong="H5193"\w*, \w like|strong="H5921"\w* cedars \w beside|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w Water|strong="H4325"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w flow|strong="H5140"\w* \w from|strong="H4325"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w buckets|strong="H1805"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H4428"\w* \w abundant|strong="H7227"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*. \w His|strong="H5375"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w greater|strong="H7227"\w* \w than|strong="H4428"\w* Agag, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*.

God \w brought|strong="H3318"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w strength|strong="H8443"\w* \w like|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wild|strong="H7214"\w* \w ox|strong="H7214"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* devour \w hostile|strong="H6862"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w and|strong="H4714"\w* \w crush|strong="H1633"\w* \w their|strong="H3318"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w pierce|strong="H4272"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w with|strong="H3318"\w* \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w*.

\w He|strong="H4310"\w* crouches, \w he|strong="H4310"\w* \w lies|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w* like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lion|strong="H3833"\w*, like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*—\w who|strong="H4310"\w* dares \w to|strong="H6965"\w* \w rouse|strong="H6965"\w* \w him|strong="H1288"\w*? \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* those \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w cursed|strong="H1288"\w* \w are|strong="H4310"\w* those \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w curse|strong="H1288"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*’s anger \w burned|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w he|strong="H7121"\w* \w struck|strong="H5606"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w together|strong="H5606"\w* \w and|strong="H2088"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w summoned|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* \w my|strong="H7121"\w* enemies, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w have|strong="H2009"\w* \w persisted|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H7121"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w flee|strong="H1272"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* once \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H4725"\w*! \w I|strong="H2009"\w* said \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* reward \w you|strong="H3513"\w* richly, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w instead|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w denied|strong="H4513"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* reward.”

\w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w answered|strong="H1696"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, “\w Did|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* already \w tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*

\w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* if \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w were|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w anything|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* own \w accord|strong="H6310"\w*, \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*, \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w whatever|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w but|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w*, \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w warn|strong="H5971"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* \w oracle|strong="H5002"\w*, saying, “\w This|strong="H5375"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w whose|strong="H1397"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w open|strong="H8365"\w*,

\w the|strong="H5002"\w* prophecy \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w one|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w hears|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* words \w of|strong="H5869"\w* God, \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Most|strong="H5945"\w* \w High|strong="H5945"\w*, \w who|strong="H3045"\w* \w sees|strong="H2372"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4236"\w* \w from|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, \w who|strong="H3045"\w* bows \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* wide \w open|strong="H1540"\w*:

\w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*; \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*. \w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w star|strong="H3556"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H3478"\w* \w forth|strong="H1869"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w scepter|strong="H7626"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w crush|strong="H4272"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* skulls \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w strike|strong="H4272"\w* \w down|strong="H1869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Sheth.

Edom \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w possession|strong="H3424"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w Seir|strong="H8165"\w*, \w his|strong="H3478"\w* enemy; \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w perform|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruler|strong="H7287"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w come|strong="H5892"\w* \w from|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w destroy|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w survivors|strong="H8300"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5892"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H5375"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H5375"\w* oracle, saying: “\w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w was|strong="H7225"\w* \w first|strong="H7225"\w* \w among|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w end|strong="H5703"\w* \w is|strong="H6002"\w* destruction.”

\w Next|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H7760"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* oracle, saying: “\w Your|strong="H7760"\w* \w dwelling|strong="H4186"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H4186"\w* secure, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* \w is|strong="H4186"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cliff|strong="H5553"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w Kain|strong="H7014"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* destroyed \w when|strong="H3588"\w* Asshur takes \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*.”

Once more \w Balaam|strong="H5375"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w an|strong="H7760"\w* oracle, saying: “Ah, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w* unless \w God|strong="H4310"\w* \w has|strong="H4310"\w* \w ordained|strong="H7760"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w*?

\w Ships|strong="H6716"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* come \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w coasts|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Cyprus|strong="H3794"\w*; \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* subdue Asshur \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w Eber|strong="H5677"\w*, \w but|strong="H1571"\w* \w they|strong="H1931"\w* \w too|strong="H1571"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* perish \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* homeland, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.
